name: I bought a goldfish on a whim
name_original: I bought a goldfish on a whim
description:
A lonely girl buys a goldfish to keep her company in the house.

However, does she have what it takes to keep it alive?
And when disease strikes can she navigate through all of the conflicting information online?

Disclaimer: This game is my experience with fish keeping, and there are many different ways to run an aquarium. Do not take this game as the only way to look after fish and make sure to do your own research if you're looking to get into the hobby.
